name: CREEBS
description:
To make a Creeb in da Factoh:

  •  A Creeb's body may be comprised of up to 4 types of parts:
    • Torso-n-Legs
    • Head
    • Wings
    • Tail
  • Always start with the Torso-n-Legs. Add exactly one of each type of part, from any species of animal, to complete your Creeb.
  • Pigs don't have wings.

Also there is no sound. Find me in the pigsquad discord (@devook) if you would like to contribute body parts, music, or sound effects :]
